ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:23:59 [Issue ID 4000-136942] urn:comicvine:4000-136942 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 13:45:38. [Issue ID 136942]
ComicInfo.Summary: This book mainly consists of short stories done by the founders of Image Comics. The first story is by Rob Liefeld and is about his character Troll and his introduction into the Youngblood program. Next is a Stormwatch story by Jim Lee and Brandon Choi and a quick glimpse at Stormwatch Prime and their current status. Todd McFarlane does four pin ups showcasing characters he will be introducing into his Spawn series. Erik Larsen's story involves The Savage Dragon and the shows the risks of being involved with someone who is superpowered. Marc Silvestri show's the origin of Stryker from Cyberforce and Jim Valentino's Shadowhawk shows how he deals with criminals.
